scene module¶

class scene.Scene¶

Bases: object

Class that encompasses a ‘mode’ of the game.

process_input(events, keys)¶

Each scene must define how it processes user input

Parameters:
  • display – The size of the window.
  • events – The events to be handled.
  • keys – The list of all keys and whether they are pressed or not.
switch_scene(next)¶

Used to change the current scene to a new one.

Parameters:next – The scene to be swapped with the current scene.
update()¶

Each scene must define how it updates itself
